name: Open Multiple Files File List
summary: An OMFL file is a file list used by Open Multiple Files, a file-opening application developed by Vovsoft. It contains a plain text list of files, folders, and/or URLs that a user can open simultaneously using Open Multiple Files. OMFL files are created by selecting File â†’ Save List Into File... in Open Multiple Files' menu bar.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
